pr_title: refactor: Remove popup message for GIT unsupported operation #318

timeline.message: refactor: Remove popup message, track event in log file #318
refactor: Remove popup message, track event in log file #318

timeline.bodyText: So you are going to log it only on the server, not on the client?
timeline.author: temanbrcom

replies.bodyText: Yes because is an information that give no value to the user since with git filesystem we still analyze the document so the message is pretty useless, but I could implement the things in a different way if needed
replies.author: zacanbrcom

replies.bodyText: BTW if user open a copybook file we still throw a popup message to the user
replies.author: zacanbrcom

replies.bodyText: Ok, I got it, it's fine
replies.author: temanbrcom
